Desc.entry: A walk-in service for adults with minor injuries eg cuts, sprains, burns and small fractures, open from 8am-8pm. All medical and surgical cases should attend the Accident and Emergency Department at the Northern General Hospital. No ambulance cases will be brought to the Minor Injuries Unit.

DisabledAccess.entry: Changing Places Toilet available in this building
